column4: Hello room :) I am running an update on a new Ubtunu 10.10 install and it keeps hanging at configuring linux-image-2.6.35-22-generic. In the update box it says Generating grub.cfg..............it has been that way for 30 minutes. Suggestions please?

do you really need to boot to CLI or just access it?

you can add that option manually each time while booting grub
